name: Explosive Madness
description:
Explosive Madness is an exciting game about physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures using tools and explosives! In the game you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.
Control your pickaxe and destroy everything in your path! There are many unique buildings waiting for you in the game, so destroy them all!

Game Features:
- Many levels
- Complete destruction of objects
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
